title: Help
body: Everytime i go on the internet and then go on league my cursor wont change into the little finger, so i cant text, upgrade abilities or sometimes i cant even leave the screen. This keeps happening and its super annoying. does anyone else get this ?

replies.body: Maybe alt+tab and click on the league window, sounds silly but it might work ahahah, happens to me sometimes because i alt tab a lot during loading screen

are you running an old version of overwolf or another overlay program? Overlay programs have recently gone through a huge number of overhauls and older versions will interfere with the cursor for the current client. The old replay viewer program will also create this issue.

Basically either uninstall or update any overlays, and that should fix it? I had a similar issue a while ago.
TBH i don't know what overwolf is and what kidn of programs could it be ? i have like a computer cleaner thing, discord, steam and another game. Could it be one of these ?
If you have discord overlay turned on, turn it off.
Something is making it not recognised ontop of all other windows, tried reinstalling? other than that not sure what else.. something to do with the way your windows are layered.
I mean it will eventually stop, it has done this before and its super annoying. also bugspalt just popped up so it may be that ???
play full screen or windowed fullscreen see if that changes anything.

i have tried everything, nothing works. it has once again happened, at this rate ill get a leavebuster. 
I cant type or do anything, sometimes i have to wait till the game is finished to leave.
